author: ruwan
msg: Adding a global timer for the Synapse configuraiton so that when ever we need a timer task to be scheduled, we can use the SynapseConfiguraiton.getSynapseTimer() rather than forking a new timer thread.
Added the -Ditr property for the StockQuoteClient to add iterations to the message body element

msg: Added KeyListener to the SearchField, DoubleClickListener and KeyListener to the TableViewer.

msg: add static build option. Thanks to Boris Kolpackov
